p: Mosquito collections were transported on ice to the laboratory and were killed by freezing. All mosquitoes were sexed and identified to species. Female Ae. aegypti, Ae. albopictus, and Aedes japonicus were placed in 2-mL vials containing not more than 10 female mosquitoes and stored at −20°C until they could be shipped to the CDC Dengue Branch where they were stored at −80°C until tested for viral RNA.
